section.audio_text: The outboard display unit contains the Primary Flight Display PFD on the inboard side, and a new auxiliary area outboard. Notice that the PFD has an expanded sky/ground display. The groundspeed is now shown in the upper left corner of the compass rose area and will no longer be timeshared with the mach readout. The MAX and NG PFD and Navigation displays function the same. Let’s take a closer look at the elements of the Auxiliary area.
